alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Lake County; Northern Trinity; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Lake County; Southern Trinity; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 02 at 2:44PM PST until March 05 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 1000 FEET... * WHAT....1.5 to 2.5 feet of snow expected above 2000 feet. 2 to 10 inches of wet snow between 1000 and 2000 feet. Trace amounts possible below 1000 feet. Wind gusts as high as 35 mph can cause dangerously low visibilities. * WHERE...Portions of northwest California. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday to 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be nearly impossible across mountain roads and highway passes including highways 299, 36, 3, 101, and 199.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
